speaker: Agent
text: Hello and thank you for contacting General Corporation. Before we start may I have your first and last name?

speaker: Client
text: [PERSON-15] [PERSON-14]

speaker: Agent
text: And what is your account number?

speaker: Client
text: It's [PHONE-7] I think.

speaker: Agent
text: And your social security number?

speaker: Client
text: It's [SSN-10].

speaker: Agent
text: And what is your email address?

speaker: Client
text: It's [EMAIL-12]

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you [PERSON-15]. How may I help you today?

speaker: Client
text: I'm trying to pay my bill but it's not working.

speaker: Agent
text: Ok is this the 1st time you've tried to make the payment?

text: yes

text: I can help you with that. Are you trying to pay with a bank draft or a credit card?

speaker: Agent
text: It's a three digit number usually on the back of your debit card next to the signature strip.

speaker: Client
text: Oh ok. It's <CVV/> or 412

speaker: Agent
text: When did you want the payment to process?

speaker: Client

speaker: Agent
text: Do I have your authorization to run your debit card in the amount of [MONEY-18]?

speaker: Client
text: Yes.

speaker: Agent
text: Ok one moment please while I run your debit card.

text: Ok

speaker: Agent
text: The system is telling me that it needs your physical address associated with the card.

speaker: Client
text: Ok. It's [ADDRESS-5] tes. The zip is [ZIP-11] or <ZIP/>.

speaker: Agent
text: I also need a phone number associated with the account.

speaker: Client
text: Itâ€™s probably my cell phone. That's [PHONE-9]. It could also be my land line which is [PHONE-8]

speaker: Agent
text: And what is your four digit PIN code?

speaker: Client
text: I believe it's <PIN/>. Or it could be [PIN-13]

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. I will try running the transaction again.

speaker: Client
text: Ok thanks.

speaker: Agent
text: The payment was successful. You should get an email confirmation that a payment in the amount of [MONEY-18] was made on August 11th at 11:59 AM. Is there anything else I can help you with?

speaker: Agent
